ModMetaData.name: Escape the Rimworld - Wastelander Branch - Combat Extended Edition
ModMetaData.author: zhrocks11 Artwork By; Skytheman32
ModMetaData.description: The Second installment in the Escape the Rimworld modding series, Wasteland branch adds more punch to the vanilla weapons and adds a brand new set of worn down "wastelander weapons" they take less to craft but are less effictive in combat.
